summary: Changes Ma'iq the Liar so that he will also sell some rare items...
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes Ma'iq the Liar so that he will sell some rare items on the occasions that you come across him.

I've simply edited the actor so he is part of a merchant faction I created myself that sells some of the rarer items in the game.

Ma'iq will now sell the following items:

Jarrin Roots
Daedra Hearts
Hawk Beaks
Hawk Feathers
Wisp Wrappings
Powdered Mammoth Tusk
Pearls
Small Pearls

Please note that all of these items, with the exception of daedra hearts have also been increased in price - the jarrin root have a base value of 10,000. Yes, it's a lot but that's the price you have to pay for such a powerful ingredient.

I was going to create a new NPC completely, but I can't figure out how to make them roam like Ma'iq, so if anyone is willing to help out then I'd be grateful for that also.

If you like this mod please endorse.
author: Deathslayr
